title: My Gingerbread ward skin vanished
body: I had recently acquired the gingerbread ward skin from hextech crafting, and I've used it multiple times already, but it suddenly disappeared from my champ select ward select. This has made me sad

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

There is currently a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins. Don't worry - you still own them!

In the meantime, we're looking into what's causing this.
ur lucky mate i only play lol for my gingerbread ward skin. fix or im going to dota 2.... consider this as your last warning

Same for me, my gingerbread ward skin vanished from selection.
I paid for it so what is happening Riot ?
